io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.coord

Class CoordFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.Parametric
      • io.smudgr.engine.SmudgeComponent
        • io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.AlgorithmComponent
          • io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.coord.CoordFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectItem, ReflectableType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvergeCoords, RadialCoords, SkewedCoords, StraightCoords

    public abstract class CoordFunction
extends AlgorithmComponent
    The abstract CoordFunction is an AlgorithmComponent that specifies in what order an Operation should act on the PixelFrame.

    Depending on the Operation, ordering may make no visual difference. In many operations though, order will dramatically change the form of the image.

    Generating the coordinate set (generateIfChanged()) is expensive and happens conservatively, usually only on bound or image dimension changes.
